alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Ford; Gray; Hodgeman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:58PM CDT until July 21 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR FORD...SOUTHEASTERN HODGEMAN...EAST CENTRAL GRAY AND NORTHWESTERN EDWARDS COUNTIES... At 557 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hanston to near Ensign, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Hanston around 605 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Ft. Dodge and Kinsley. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
